translation: n.假期；休假；腾出vi.度假
examples: (1) I was on vacation last week and didn't receive your fax.(2) I was too busy to spare time for a vacation.(3) Immediate vacation of the house is essential.(4) They will vacation in Hawaii during Christmas.
(1) 上星期我正在度假，没收到你们的传真。(2) 我太忙抽不出休假的时间。(3) 立即腾出这所房子是当务之急.(4) 他们圣诞节期间将到夏威夷度假。

translation: adj.空虚的；空的；木然的
examples: (1) Absence of occupation is not rest, a mind quite vacant is a mind distress.(2) The sky remains infinitely vacant for earth there to build its heaven with dreams.(3) He was appointed to the vacant post.(4) There are some vacant offices on the third floor.(5) The lavatory is vacant.(6) He does not know what to do with his vacant time.(7) She has a vacant look on her face.
(1) 无所事事不是休息，十分空虚的心灵是痛苦的心灵。(2) 天空总是无限空虚地用梦在大地构筑天堂。(3) 他被委派填补那空缺。(4) 四楼有几间空著的办公室。(5) 厕所现在无人使用。(6) 他不知道空闲时间该干点什么。(7) 她的脸上是一片茫然的神色。

translation: adj.不明确的；模糊的；茫然的；犹豫不决的
examples: (1) At the back of his mind was the vague idea that he had met her before.(2) She is so vague that I can never understand what she is trying to say.(3) His vague ideas crystallized into a definite plan.(4) I'm quite vague about what happened.(5) His vague reply disconcerted us completely.
(1) 他隐隐约约地觉得以前曾经见过她。(2) 她说话含含糊糊，我怎么也听不明白她想说些什么。(3) 他那些模糊的想法变成了一个明确的计划。(4) 我对发生的事很不了解。(5) 他那含糊的回答弄得我们很为难。

translation: adj.自负的；徒劳的；无效的；虚荣的
examples: (1) She is vain and foolish, and yet people like her.(2) She is vain of her voice.(3) They endeavoured to make her happy but in vain.(4) All his father's exhortations were in vain.(5) We tried in vain to make him change his mind.(6) The world had made him extravagant and vain.(7) She is so vain that she can't pass a mirror without looking into it.
(1) 她自负而愚蠢，然而人们喜欢她。(2) 她自以为她的声音了不起。(3) 他们尽量使她快乐，却徒劳无功。(4) 他父亲的一切劝告都无效。(5) 我们想使他改变主意，结果是白费心机。(6) 世俗使他变得放荡不羁，虚荣自负。(7) 她好爱虚荣,每经过一面镜子都要照一下。

translation: adj.有效的；有根据的；合法的；正当的
examples: (1) Please provide a valid screen name.(2) A credit card is not a valid proof of identity.(3) Whether or not you believe the lawsuit is fair or valid, it is vital that you act on the summons.(4) The values may be valid,but are not allowed contextually.(5) Illness is a valid excuse for being absent from work.
(1) 请输入有效的显示名。(2) 银行发的支票保付卡不是有效的身份证明文件。(3) 无论这起诉讼是否是公平的或者是有根据的，认真对待传票对当事人来说是至关重要的。(4) 提供的值可能是合法的，但是在当前的上下文环境中不被允许。(5) 生病是不去上班的正当理由。

translation: n.山谷；溪谷；流域
examples: (1) They traversed the valley on foot.(2) The river twines through the valley.(3) The valley was hidden from view in the mist.(4) The valley was hidden from view in the mist.(5) He has a large farm in the Mississippi Valley.
(1) 他们徒步走过这座山谷。(2) 这条河流蜿蜒穿过山谷。(3) 溪谷隐没在雾霭之中，看不见了。(4) 溪谷隐没在雾霭之中，看不见了。(5) 他在密西西比河流域拥有一个大农场。

translation: adj.贵重的；宝贵的n.(pl.)贵重物品
examples: (1) This old table is a valuable piece of furniture.(2) This painting is very valuable.(3) He gave us a valuable insight into the problems of education.(4) This experience is valuable to me.
(1) 这张旧桌子是一件很珍贵的家具。(2) 这幅绘画非常名贵。(3) 他在教育问题上给我们提供了宝贵的见解。(4) 这一经历对我很有用。

translation: n.价值；价格；重要性；(pl)价值观；数值v.估价；重视；评价
examples: (1) This book will be of great value to him in his study.(2) The fall in the dollar's value worldwide sent tremors through the Wall Street.(3) No one knows the value of health until he loses it.(4) As his novel values seem to lose appeal, what surprise might the party bring to win the election?(5) You'd better ask an expert concerned to value your apartment.(6) The Chinese highly value the strong family ties.(7) How do you value the function of marketing in the management process?
(1) 这本书将对他的研究有很大价值。(2) 全球性的美元价格下跌震动了整个华尔街。(3) 直到失去了健康，人们方知健康的重要性。(4) 当他独特的价值观逐渐失去吸引力后,那么他所在的党派要准备什么惊喜来赢得大选呢?(5) 你应该请一位有关的专家来对你的房子进行估价。(6) 中国人高度重视家庭关系。(7) 你如何评价营销在管理过程中的作用?

translation: n.香草
examples: (1) He used to love milk flavoured with vanilla.
(1) 他过去常爱喝带香草味的牛奶。

translation: n.多样；种类；多样化n.杂耍
examples: (1) The hotel offers its guests a wide variety of amusements.(2) The shop sells a great variety of porcelain wares.(3) We all need variety in our diet.(4) Last week we went to a variety show.(5) That is why the television networks keep serving up old movies and second-rate variety programmes.
(1) 这个旅馆为住客提供了各种各样的娱乐活动。(2) 这家店铺出售品种繁多的瓷器。(3) 我们都需要饮食多样化.(4) 上星期我们去看了杂耍。(5) 这就是为什么电视台一直播送旧电影和二流杂耍等老一套节目的原因。

translation: adj.各种各样的
examples: (1) There are various ways of solving the problem.(2) Their hobbies are many and various.
(1) 有各种各样解决问题的方法。(2) 他们的业余爱好五花八门。

translation: n.花瓶
examples: (1) That's an alabaster vase.(2) The flaw in this vase makes it less valuable.(3) The broken vase lay in shatters.(4) She arranged some flowerets in the vase.(5) The vase made by the artisan is wonderful.
(1) 那是个雪花石膏做的花瓶。(2) 这个花瓶因为有点缺陷，不那么值钱了。(3) 那只打碎了的花瓶的碎片撒了一地。(4) 她往瓶子里插了些小花。(5) 那个手艺人做的花瓶棒极了。

translation: adj.巨大的；广阔的
examples: (1) That is a vast and lavish party.(2) A vast crowd turned out to watch the match.(3) There is always a vast chasm between rich and poor.(4) The Pacific Ocean is a vast expanse of water.(5) The vast champaign was covered with thick snow.
(1) 那是个规模盛大、极其铺张的宴会。(2) 大群的观众到场观看比赛。(3) 贫富的鸿沟始终存在。(4) 太平洋是一片广大的水域。(5) 广袤的平原被厚厚的雪覆盖着。

translation: abbr.视频高密光盘（=Video Compact Disc）；影碟光盘(Versatile Compact Disk) abbr.可变电容二极管（=Variable Capacitance Diode）；真空缩窄装置(Vacuum Constriction Device)
examples: (1) This VCD can be returned for repair under warranty.
(1) VCD在保修期间可以退回维修。

translation: n.小牛肉
examples: (1) He cut the veal into cutlets.(2) The veal was drowning in a red sauce.
(1) 他把小牛肉切成肉块。(2) 这块小牛肉正浸在酱油里。

translation: n.车辆；交通工具；传播媒介；手段；工具
examples: (1) No entry for vehicle!(2) It is time for the yearly check of vehicle safety.(3) Subway is a convenient vehicle for those white collars.(4) Television has become an important vehicle for spreading political ideas.(5) It subsequently evolved into an even more complex investment vehicle.(6) Language is the vehicle of thought.
(1) 禁止车辆入内！(2) 到车辆安全年审的时间了。(3) 地铁对于白领阶层来说是很方便的交通工具。(4) 电视已成为传播政治思想的重要媒介。(5) 并随后发展成为一种更为复杂的投资手段。(6) 语言是表达思想的工具。

translation: n.版本；说法；译本；形式
examples: (1) The new version of this dictionary is not in use yet.(2) The two newspapers gave different versions of what happened.(3) The book was translated into many versions and sold all over the world.(4) This shirt is a cheaper version of the one I saw in that shop.
(1) 这本字典的新版本还未通行。(2) 两家报纸对发生的事说法不一。(3) 这本书被翻译成多种译文并行销全球。(4) 这件衬衫同我在那家商店里见到的几乎一样，但它是便宜货。

translation: adj.垂直的；纵向的；顶点的n.垂直物；垂直的位置
examples: (1) The northern face of the mountain is almost vertical.(2) The vertical line meets the horizontal one here.(3) Wire saws can cut in any orientation, vertical or horizontal.(4) The angles refer to the polar view angle, i.e. the angle measured from the vertical.(5) The racquet is now set to be vertical at contact.(6) Their eyes were large with vertical pupils.
(1) 这座山向北的一面几乎是垂直的。(2) 垂直线与水平线在此相交。(3) 钢丝锯能够切割任何方向,纵向或横向。(4) 角涉及到极面观的角，例如垂直物上测量的角。(5) 网拍现在在接触点是设定垂直的。(6) 他们的眼睛更大，拥有垂直的瞳孔。

translation: n.背心；内衣；汗衫；马甲vt.授予；使穿衣vi.穿衣服；(权力、财产等)归于
examples: (1) One button on the vest is loose.(2) Jimmy is wearing a vest under a coat.(3) Then I became aware of his hand drifting lower and suddenly I was wide awake as he stroked my neck and started sliding his hand down my vest top.(4) She was dressed only in a vest and underpants.(5) He takes off his coat to reveal a bright red vest.(6) Parliament is vested with the power of making laws.(7) This is the power vested in a priest.
(1) 背心上的一粒鈕扣松了。(2) 吉米在外套里面穿着一件背心。(3) 接着我意识到他的手向下滑去，当他抚摸着我的脖子并开始将手滑向我的内衣时，我猛地清醒起来。(4) 她只穿了一件汗衫和一条短裤。(5) 他脱下上衣，露出一件鲜红的马甲。(6) 国会有立法权.(7) 这是赋予牧师的权力。

translation: prep.经由；通过
examples: (1) We went from London to Washington via New York.(2) This flight is roetud to Chicago via New York.(3) He flew to Europe via the North Pole.(4) I can send him a note via the internal mail system.
(1) 我们从伦敦经纽约到华盛顿。(2) 这班机是经纽约飞往芝加哥的。(3) 他经由北极飞到欧洲。(4) 我可以通过内部通信系统给他发个通知。

translation: n.缺点；恶习；邪恶；罪行；生理缺陷adj.副的；代理的prep.代替pref.代理的；副的n.老虎钳
examples: (1) He who thinks too much of his virtues reminds others of his vice.(2) Virtue and vice are two different things: the former leads to peace, the latter to misery.(3) There is a lot of vices in big cities.(4) The vice is bolted to the work-bench.(5) The convulsive pressure of her slight hand held her companion as firmly as an iron vice could have held her.(6) He reported on the whole event to the vice premier.(7) John was appointed postmaster vice Richard retired.(8) She is vice-chair of the education committee.(9) He is the vice-president in charge of sales.

(1) 念念不忘自己长处的人,会使别人想起他的缺点。(2) 美德与邪恶是不同的：前者带来和平,后者导致痛苦。(3) 大城市存在许多道德败坏的行为。(4) 老虎钳是用螺栓拧在工作台上的。(5) 她瘦小的手，以其痉挛的压力，坚定地钩住了她的同伴，就象老虎钳夹紧她一般。(6) 他把整个事件向副总理作了汇报。(7) 约翰被任命为邮政局长,取代退休的理查德。(8) 她是教育委员会的代理主席。(9) 他是负责销售的副总经理。

translation: n.胜利；成功
examples: (1) The soldiers exulted at their victory.(2) I have every reason to be confident of our victory.(3) People in the city held a great party to celebrate their victory.(4) They were intoxicated with victory.(5) No victory comes out without price.
(1) 战士们为取得胜利而欢跃。(2) 我有充分的理由坚信胜利是属于我们的。(3) 本市的市民举行了盛大的晚会庆祝他们的胜利。(4) 他们因成功而狂喜。(5) 成功就是要付出代价的。

translation: n.可视电话
examples: (1) Your wristwatch videophone suddenly rings.(2) In the future, shopping can be done by videophone.
(1) 突然，你手表上的可视电话响了。(2) 在将来，购买东西能在可视电话中进行。

translation: n.视野；见解；风景；方法；检查v.考虑；看；把 ... 视为
examples: (1) The valley was hidden from view in the mist.(2) His view of life is different from yours.(3) I enjoy the view of the bay in the starlight.(4) He took a subjective view of the problem.(5) The police took a view of the scene.(6) People came from all over the world to view her work.(7) We view every customer as a partner.
(1) 溪谷隐没在雾霭之中，看不见了。(2) 他的人生观与你的不同。(3) 我喜欢星光下的海湾风景。(4) 他用主观的方法看问题。(5) 警方检查了现场。(6) 人们从世界各地涌来欣赏她的作品。(7) 我们将每一位客户视为合作伙伴。

translation: n.观看者；电视观众；观察器
examples: (1) A larger crystal ball will also give a larger area in which the viewer can observe whatever they need to see.(2) The television viewer takes no initiative.(3) Of course, being a selective viewer isn't bad.(4) The viewer cannot complete this procedure.(5) DARPA is developing several viewer options for the computers, including a set of eyeglasses with embedded display in the frame being built by the Micro Optical Corporation.
(1) 大的水晶球会提供观看者想看到的地方的大面积范围。(2) 电视观众没有施展主动性。(3) 当然，被选中做了电视观众也并不意味着是件坏事。(4) 观察器不能完成该过程。(5) 国防高级研究计划局正在研制与这些计算机配套的几种观察器，包括正由微光学公司制造的在镜框中嵌入显示器的眼镜。

translation: n.村民
examples: (1) The enemy raped the country and killed many villagers.(2) This clergyman is respected by all the villagers.(3) The villagers knew about the scandal.
(1) 敌人掠夺了这个地区，并且杀害了许多村民。(2) 这位教士受到所有村民的尊敬。(3) 村子里的居民知道这件丑事。

translation: n.醋
examples: (1) Vinegar has an acid taste.(2) He sprinkled vinegar on his fish and chips.(3) His retort was delivered with a strong note of vinegar.
(1) 醋有酸味。(2) 他把醋洒在鱼和薯条上。(3) 他的反驳带着强烈不满的口气。

translation: v.侵犯；违反；扰乱；亵渎；强奸
examples: (1) Don't violate other people's copyright.(2) I'm committed not to violate the rules.(3) The country violated the international agreement.(4) The sound of guns violated the peace of the countryside.(5) The soldiers violated the church by using it as a stable.
(1) 不要侵犯他人版权。(2) 我有义务不违反规定。(3) 这个国家违反了国际协议。(4) 炮声扰乱了乡村的宁静。(5) 士兵们把教堂当马厩用而亵渎了它。

translation: n.猛烈；暴力；暴行；强暴
examples: (1) The wind blew with great violence.(2) The violence of his words alarmed her.(3) She slammed the door with violence.(4) I detest violence with my whole being.(5) The young man was charged with robbery with violence.(6) Quakers strongly oppose violence and war.(7) His violence was abhorrent to everybody.(8) I condemn this senseless violence.(9) The act of violence made people boil with anger.
(1) 风异常猛烈地吹着。(2) 他言语上的猛烈使她产生了警觉。(3) 她砰的一声用力关上了门。(4) 我毕生谴责暴力行为。(5) 这个年轻人被控暴力抢劫。(6) 教友派信徒们强烈反对暴力和战争。(7) 大家都痛恨他的暴行。(8) 我谴责这种无谓的暴行.(9) 这种强暴的行为令人发指。

translation: adj.猛烈的；强烈的；暴力的；极端的
examples: (1) The soldiers launched into a violent attack.(2) She was in violent temper.(3) They showed violent opposition to the oppressor.(4) Violent criminals like that are dangers to society.(5) He is suffering from violent pains.
(1) 士兵们展开猛烈的攻击。(2) 她暴跳如雷。(3) 他们对压迫者表现出强烈的不满。(4) 那种暴力罪犯对社会是一种危害。(5) 他承受着极度的痛苦。

translation: n.小提琴
examples: (1) He plays the violin for the fun of it.(2) The audience lapped up the violin solo.(3) The violin is not quite in tune with the piano.
(1) 她拉小提琴只是为了好玩。(2) 观众对小提琴独奏反应热烈。(3) 这小提琴跟钢琴的调子不太和谐。

translation: n.小提琴手
examples: (1) The drummer doubles in brass as a violinist.
(1) 这鼓手还是一个小提琴手。

translation: n.美德；德行；优点；贞操
examples: (1) Fidelity to engagement is a virtue.(2) My neighbor is a man of highest virtue.(3) He said his plan had the virtue of being the easiest to implement.(4) Meekness is a virtue he appreciates in his wife.(5) She's definitely not a woman of easy virtue.
(1) 信守诺言是一种美德。(2) 我的邻居是一个具有高尚品德的人。(3) 他说他的计划的优点是最简单易行。(4) 温顺是他所欣赏的妻子的优点之一。(5) 她决不是一个放荡的女人。

translation: n.病毒；病原体
examples: (1) Scientists have isolated the virus causing the epidemic.(2) We should be watchful of computer viruses.(3) HBV is a virus that causes inflammation of the liver.(4) Could you do me a favor? My computer suffered from computer virus.(5) Iraq also got samples of other deadly pathogens, including the West Nile virus.(6) The excrement and the excrement polluted water carry a lot of pathogens of them, including the diseaseful virus and worm eggs, which threaten seriously the health of the habitants.
(1) 科学家们已分离出引起这种流行病的病毒。(2) 我们应该警惕计算机病毒。(3) HBV是一种会引起肝脏发炎的病毒。(4) 能帮帮我吗?我电脑中病毒了。(5) 伊拉克还由此得到了其他能致命的病原体包括西尼罗河病毒。(6) 粪便中和被粪便污染的饮用水中，含有多种肠道传染病和寄生虫病的病原体，包括致病的病毒和虫卵，严重威胁农民的身体健康。

translation: n.签证vt.办理签证
examples: (1) We've had to cut a few corners to get your visa ready in time.(2) He is applying to the Consul for a visa.(3) He experienced great difficulty in getting a visa to leave the country.(4) He has applied for an entry visa.(5) I was eventually granted an exit visa.(6) I have my passport visaed.
(1) 我们得简化手续才能将你的签证及时办妥。(2) 他正向领事申请签证。(3) 他申请出国签证经历了很大的困难。(4) 他已申请入境签证。(5) 我终于获得了出境签证。(6) 我已取得了护照签证。

translation: adj.视觉的；视力的；看的见的；形象的n.画面；图象
examples: (1) Her designs have a strong visual appeal.(2) He has a good visual memory.(3) His failed to pass his visual test.
(1) 她的设计在视觉上很有感染力。(2) 他有良好的视觉记忆力。(3) 他没有通过他的视力测试。

translation: adj.至关重要的；有活力的；生死攸关的
examples: (1) The government saw the introduction of new technology as vital.(2) She's a very vital sort of person.(3) Confronted with such a vital problem of life and death, he looked as cool as a cucumber.
(1) 政府认为引进新技术至关重要。(2) 她是个精力旺盛的人。(3) 面对着这样重大的生死问题,他的神态却异常冷静。

translation: adj.生动的；鲜艳的；栩栩如生的
examples: (1) This place conjures up vivid memories.(2) My daughter is a child with vivid imagination.(3) This girl gave a vivid description of the event.(4) Only the vivid red hair ever stood out.(5) The actresses were wearing vivid historical costumes.(6) The new varieties have very vivid designs and beautiful colors.(7) Television presents a vivid world in front of us.(8) Dickens'novels are full of vivid characterization.(9) The sculpture is really very vivid.
(1) 这个地方使人回忆起许多生动的往事。(2) 我女儿是一个想象力活跃的孩子。(3) 那女孩对这件事作了一番生动的描述。(4) 只有鲜艳的红头发非常令人注目。(5) 女演员们穿着鲜艳的古装。(6) 那新产品图案新颖，色泽鲜艳。(7) 电视在我们面前展示出一个栩栩如生的世界。(8) 狄更斯的小说中充满了栩栩如生的人物形象。(9) 真是被雕刻得栩栩如生啊。

translation: n.词汇；词汇量
examples: (1) You can look up this word in the vocabulary.(2) He has an extensive vocabulary.(3) That if your vocabulary is limited your chances of success are limited.(4) She has a large English vocabulary at command.
(1) 你可以在词汇表里查这个词。(2) 他词汇很丰富。(3) 如果你的词汇量不大，你成功的机会也就不多。(4) 她能灵活运用掌握的大量英语辞汇。

translation: n.火山
examples: (1) Vesuvius is an active volcano.(2) The eruption of volcano makes many people lose their lives.(3) That volcano cast forth lots of lava and ashes.(4) The erupting volcano was an awe-inspiring sight.
(1) 维苏威山是一座活火山。(2) 火山的爆发使许多人丧失了生命。(3) 那火山喷了出大量熔岩和灰烬。(4) 火山爆发是使人畏惧的景象。

translation: adj.自愿的；志愿的n.(教堂礼拜仪式前后或进行期间的)乐器独奏
examples: (1) He made a voluntary statement to the police.(2) Many social services are still provided by voluntary societies in our city.(3) We rely entirely on voluntary contribution.(4) She's very taken up with voluntary work at the moment.(5) Although I'm retired, voluntary work keeps me in the swim (of things).(6) The organization is run on a voluntary basis.
(1) 他自愿为警方作供。(2) 在我们的城市，许多社会服务仍然是有志愿团体提供的。(3) 我们全靠自愿捐赠。(4) 她目前大部分时间和精力都用在志愿工作上了。(5) 我虽已退休，但仍做些义务工作，以便了解当前的情势。(6) 这个组织是由志愿人员管理的.

translation: n.志愿者；(自行生长的)植物v.(自愿)做
examples: (1) He enlisted as a volunteer in the army.(2) He works as a volunteer at off time.(3) He volunteered a statement to the police.(4) Many people volunteer to work on the farms.(5) They volunteer for good causes.
(1) 他以志愿兵从军。(2) 在业余时间(3) 他自动向警方供出情况。(4) 许多人自动到农场劳动。(5) 她们自愿做好事。

translation: n.选举权；投票；选举；投票结果v.表决；选举；投票
examples: (1) Give women the vote!(2) I suggested putting the matter to a vote, but the chairman demurred to it.(3) A large vote was polled.(4) He used his casting vote to block the motion.(5) This vote spells defeat for the government.(6) Was the vote for or against the resolution?(7) We are going to vote on the plan .(8) He became a citizen, thereby gaining the right to vote.(9) I may vote for her at the next election.(10) Only citizens are eligible to vote.(11) Parliament voted the bill through without a debate.(12) He refused to declare which way he would vote.

(1) 给妇女选举权！(2) 我建议对此事投票表决，但主席表示反对。(3) 投票踊跃。(4) 他用他的投票反对动议的通过。(5) 这次选举意味着政府的失败。(6) 表决结果是赞成还是反对此决议?(7) 我们打算就这一提案进行表决。(8) 他成为公民，并因此获得了选举权。(9) 下届选举我可能选她。(10) 只有公民有选举资格。(11) 国会未经辩论就投票通过了这项法案。(12) 他拒绝声明他将投票给哪一边。

translation: n.航行；旅程v.航行；旅行
examples: (1) This is the virgin voyage of the ship.(2) The ship hit heavy fog on its voyage.(3) She went on a long sea voyage.(4) Once the voyage comes to an end.(5) Happiness is a voyage, not a destination.(6) My dream is to voyage around the world in a hot air balloon.(7) They planned to voyage across the Pacific Ocean.
(1) 这是这艘船的处女航。(2) 船在航行时碰上了大雾。(3) 她乘船在海上长途旅行。(4) 旅程结束之际。(5) 快乐是旅程，不是目的地。(6) 我的梦想是乘着热气球周游世界。(7) 他们计划做穿越太平洋的旅行。

translation: n. 蔬菜；植物；植物人adj. 蔬菜的；植物的
examples: Is a tomato a fruit or a vegetable?We've grown many vegetables in our garden.I can recommend the vegetable pie - it's the specialty of the house.What brand of vegetable oil are you using?Severe brain damage turned him into a vegetable.Since the car accident, she has just been a vegetable.He knows little about vegetable cultivation.The giant cactus is the vegetable skycraper.
蕃茄是水果还是蔬菜?我们在花园里种了许多蔬菜。我推荐一道蔬菜馅饼，它是这家餐馆的名菜。你正在用的植物油是什么牌子？他因脑部重伤而成了植物人。自从那场车祸以来，她一直是个植物人。他不懂蔬菜的栽培。高大的仙人掌是植物界巨人。

translation: adj. 恰好是，正是；甚至；十足的；特有的adv. 非常，很；完全n. (Very)人名；(英)维里
examples: She likes Beethoven very much.It is very unwise for the girl to marry him.London is a very cosmopolitan city.They sat in the very same seat.It's just the very thing I have been wanting.The queen is going to knight him with the very sword.It seemed to him the very soul of romance.You need to be at the very front of the bus.
她很喜欢贝多芬的作品。这女孩嫁给他是很不明智的。伦敦完全是个国际大城市。他们就坐在同一个座位上。这恰好是我一直想要的。女王将用同一把剑为他封爵位。在他看来，这已经是真正的罗曼蒂克了。你最好在公共汽车最前面。

translation: n. 受害人；牺牲品；牺牲者
examples: Think of yourself as a survivor, not a victim.The victim was smothered to death.She fell an easy victim to his temptation.He was the victim of injustice.
把自己看作幸运儿,不要看作受害者。受害人被窒息致死。她经不起他的诱惑，轻易地被骗了。他是不公平的牺牲者。

translation: n. [电子] 视频；录像，录像机；电视adj. 视频的；录像的；电视的v. 录制
examples: The cinema has largely yielded to the home video.They showed a video of "Gone with the Wind".Could you video the documentary for me?There is no video signal.I don't see any point of playing video games all day.We have a video camera.
电影业在很大程度上已让位给家庭录像电影。他们放了录像片《乱世佳人》。帮我录一下这个纪录片好吗？没有视频信号。我看不出整天打电动玩具有什么意义。我们有一架摄像机。

translation: n. 村庄；村民；（动物的）群落
examples: This village is as beautiful as the fairyland.There are two main nationalities in our village.
这个小村庄美如仙境。我们村子有两大民族。

translation: n. 访问；参观；逗留vt. 访问；参观；视察vi. 访问；暂住；闲谈n. (Visit)人名；(老)维西；(泰)威实
examples: I'm going to visit my aunt for a few days.I'll visit him tomorrow if weather permits.If it doesn't rain tomorrow, we will visit the Great Wall.Please stay and visit with me for a while.He will pay a visit to his wife's parents.If it rains tomorrow, we will have to put off the visit to the Summer Palace.We had a nice visit on the phone.
我打算去姑妈家住几天。如果天气条件许可,明天我要去拜访他。如果明天不下雨的话,我们将参观长城。请待一会儿跟我聊聊。他将去拜访岳父和岳母。万一明天下雨的话,我们将不得不推迟参观颐和园。我们在电话里谈得很高兴。

translation: n. 访问者，参观者；视察者；候鸟
examples: When in New York City, it is customary for the visitor to take in a Broadway show.The visitor twisted his neck to look at the photograph on the wall behind him.Always remember, you're never more than one-click away from visitor abandonment.Some sites cram too much information on each page causing problems to your visitor in recognising the section they are looking for.She smiled falsely at her unwelcome visitor.They thought he was a visitor of great importance.
参观者到了纽约市，通常都会去百老汇观看演出。参观者扭过头看他身后墙上的照片。请记住，访问者一旦放弃浏览你的网站，他们就不会再点击你的站点了。有些网站在网页上填满了信息，在访问者寻找信息的过程中，给他们造成了一些麻烦。她虚情假意地对不受她欢迎的访客微笑。他们认为他是一个颇不简单的访客。

translation: n. 声音；嗓音；发言权；愿望vt. 表达；吐露
examples: His voice shook with fear.The little girl spoke in a high childish voice.We could hear the children's voices in the garden.She is enamored of the sound of her own voice.We should translate this sentence in passive voice.The workers want a voice in management decisions.In the past the voice of dissension had been quickly snuffed out.He was chosen to voice their grievance.The voice often falls at the end of a statement.If using your voice is difficult, then you know what dysphonia is.
他害怕得声音发抖。小女孩说话时声音尖尖的，带着童音。我们可以听到花园里孩子们的声音。她陶醉于自己的嗓音。我们应该用被动语态翻译这个句子。工人要求在管理决策上有发言权。在过去不同的意见都很快被压制下去。他被选去表达他们的不满。在陈述句的句尾，发音通常降低。如果你发声困难，你就会明白什么是发音障碍了。

translation: n. 排球
examples: Volleyball is a team game.We are going to play neither basketball nor volleyball.Their team really whipped ours at volleyball.On the whole, I find volleyball more interesting.
排球是一项要求全队默契配合的运动。我们既不将打篮球也不将打排球。他们的排球队彻底击败了我们队。总的说来,我认为排球运动更有趣。
